participant_1.background:
My family is close because we like the same things, like Disney movies.
i work as a waitress.
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
i have entered into many violin competitions before and have placed in a few of them.
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.
i wish i could live forever.
I like to visit running and football websites to keep up with the latest news.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
I'm a big fan of classic comfort food, like macaroni and cheese.

content.text: Howdy howdy!
Hey there, what's up?
Not much, just working today. I'm a waitress.
Oh wow, I've always wanted to be a waitress.
I love it. It's a lot of fun and I meet a lot of interesting people.
That's awesome. I wish I could meet more people.
What do you do for fun?
Well, I like to swim, run, and read. I also like to watch football and football.
Oh cool! I love to swim too. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
Haha, I'm not very good either. But it's still fun!
Yeah, I agree. What's your favorite food?
Oh man, that's a tough one. I love macaroni and cheese.
No way! That's my favorite too!
Haha, what a coincidence!
Yeah, I guess so. I love all kinds of comfort food.
Me too. I'm a sucker for anything that makes me feel good.
Same here. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should get together sometime and have some macaroni and cheese.
That would be fun! I'm free next weekend.
Perfect! I'll make the macaroni and cheese.
Sounds great! I'll bring the drinks.
Sounds like a plan
